named-query.name: Student.getStudentByPesel
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM Student s JOIN FETCH s.user u JOIN FETCH s.personInformation pi WHERE pi.pesel = :pesel AND u.role.id = 3

named-query.name: Student.getStudentByUsername
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM Student s JOIN FETCH s.user u WHERE u.username = :username AND u.role.id = 3
